From: Internal News <internalnews@onechalhoub.com>

CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-07-16 13:30
Subject: 2nd Edition | Information Security Newsletter
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/5b12ff586e51d73dcf876da300d1e3de42206761.png> 	

Welcome to the Summer Edition of our Information Security Newsletter!​

As the summer season is in full flow and many of us are taking a well-deserved break, it’s important to remember that while we may switch off, cyber threats do not.

Whether you're exploring new destinations, working remotely, or simply catching up on emails, staying alert and informed is essential to protecting yourself, our customers and the systems and system that powers our Group.

Let’s dive in and keep our digital environment secure all season long!

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/e440df101af850746e36b5ab99d60994828207142.png> 	

Summer is here, and many of us are taking well-deserved breaks — but cybercriminals don’t take vacations. Whether you're booking flights, connecting to airport Wi-Fi, or sharing travel pics, here are a few quick Do’s and Don’ts to keep your data safe

Summer is here, and many of us are taking well-deserved breaks — but cybercriminals don’t take vacations. Whether you're booking flights, connecting to airport Wi-Fi, or sharing travel pics, here are a few quick Do’s and Don’ts to keep your data safe

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/9643f39344226c4ea36835c2ff88b2841345614140.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/b53b17a3e918e02220771fcf05db0efc644742700.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/af4574fbba5780e87900a37783613965942875229.png> 	

We recently conducted a controlled phishing simulation across the Group to assess our level of awareness around external phishing threats and the results are in!

- Total number team members targeted: 4,214
- Email open rate: 49.4%
- Of those who opened the email, 63.4% did not click the link
- Click rate (18.1%): Approximately 763 employees clicked on the phishing link.

Many of you spotted the red flags - well done!

For those who clicked, don’t worry this is a learning opportunity, please complete the phishing awareness training you have received.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/e6c3f9d4955f993c290c1825e69370f415225029.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1526&user=10620> 	

As we enjoy hybrid work and digital flexibility, it’s important to remember the Acceptable Use Policy still applies.

You can take a look at the policy here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1526&user=10620> 

Let’s all do our part to keep our digital environment secure and professional.

You can take a look at the policy here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1526&user=10620> 

Let’s all do our part to keep our digital environment secure and professional.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/4ab9506f806d7864936829e0ce60919a1106705644.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/7ad2cf6efa0825214fc55362b91edbec1707725010.png> 	

As part of our continued efforts to enhance cyber resilience and safeguard our Group, we are rolling out a new security solution that will regulate access to websites and cloud applications on Group-managed devices.
This solution will ensure access is granted only to secure, compliant, and business-relevant platforms, while blocking those that may pose a risk.​

Why this matters: ​
• Prevent cyber-attacks and data breaches ​
• Safeguard our customers, teams, and data ​
• Comply with global privacy and cyber security standards ​

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/7a5ec014f1f007dc1140d636b5f4b9ef898369429.png> 	

Get ready for an upgraded learning experience—designed with both our customers and our Group in mind. This refreshed training dives into real-world cyber threats, from phishing and social engineering to password best practices, all tailored to the challenges we face today.

Because protecting our customers, our Group, and one another starts with awareness.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/a17e8a636ea7f69778388b52d354dc991626193432.gif> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1527&user=10620>

Because protecting our customers, our Group, and one another starts with awareness.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/a17e8a636ea7f69778388b52d354dc991626193432.gif> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1527&user=10620> 	

Our very own Director of Information Security, Dee Deu, recently had the opportunity to sit down with the Cyberwaze podcast team in partnership with GISEC to dive deep into the evolving landscape of AI threats and cybersecurity challenges specifically impacting the luxury retail sector.

Watch the videos here:
Part 1 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1527&user=10620>      |     Part 2 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1528&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/f1b2fe1b648d74ce21b15670bbf828cf636832053.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1529&user=10620> 	

We’re proud to announce that Dee Deu has been recognized by the Khaleej Times editorial team as one of the UAE’s Most Influential Cybersecurity Leaders for 2025!


Her visionary leadership continues to set new standards for cybersecurity across our industry. Congratulations, Dee!

For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1530&user=10620>
